extension.description: This is a mod of the Exodus addon. Changes are minimal: just 3 lines edited to regain compatibility with [COLOR ff0084ff]M[/COLOR]etalli[COLOR ff0084ff]Q[/COLOR] and all references to the original artwork removed. This fork is not meant to be run other then integrated from [COLOR ff0084ff]M[/COLOR]etalli[COLOR ff0084ff]Q[/COLOR] or kodi-library.
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content provider.
